snippet: Colorado has finalized plans to create the nation’s first financial cooperatives for the marijuana trade, even though few expect the necessary approval from the Federal Reserve.
abstract: Colorado finalizes plans to create the nation’s first financial cooperatives for the marijuana trade; few expect effort to gain necessary approval of Federal Reserve, however, which is leery of offering banking services to companies that grow and sell federally controlled substance.
lead_paragraph: Colorado has finalized plans to create the nation’s first financial cooperatives for the marijuana trade, even though few expect the necessary approval from the Federal Reserve.

headline.main: Marijuana Trade Offered Credit Relief in Colorado
headline.print_headline: Marijuana Trade Offered Credit Relief in Colorado
